name: 10 Pcs Self Closing Door Hinge 3.5'' Spring Loaded Hinges Automatic Door Closer Hinge Adjustable Tension for Garage, 5/8'' Radius Corners(Silver,3.5'')
short_description: Sufficient Package Set: our door hinges set comes in a pack of 10, sufficiently enough to meet your daily needs and replacements; Each package also includes 5 internal angle screwdrivers, 5 hex wrenches, 20 positioning rods, 60 flat head screws, and 60 pointed screws to make your installation work much more convenient; The ample quantity allows you to share them with your friends or family members

Standard Size for Wide Application: the heavy duty gate hinges measure about 3-1/2 inches in length and width, with a corner radius of about 5/8", and a thickness of about 0.11 inches/ 2.7 mm, suitable for various doors; Please check the size before purchase to avoid any buying errors

Quality Material: these self closing door hinges are made of iron with an electroplated coating; The durable and robust material ensures their ability to hold various doors such as wood doors, metal doors, indoor doors, outdoor doors, residential doors, and commercial doors for an extended period

Easy Installation and Adjustment: you don't need to take off the door during the installation; Simply replace the old spring door hinges one at a time using only a screwdriver; The accompanying hex wrench allows you to freely set the tension

Automatic Door Closing: the kitchen cabinet hinges work by using spring load; They are powerful enough to close a door people forget to close, ensuring safety and energy efficiency; The adjustable tension allows you to freely either let the door close or keep it half open; This feature is particularly useful in maintaining the indoor temperature and preventing the entrance of bugs
product_description: Features: Safety recommendation: For maximum security and smooth operation, we advise you to install at least 3 door hinges per door. This recommendation ensures your door's stability and improves its weight support. Dynamic auto closing feature: The exterior door hinges feature an ideal auto closing mechanism with a resilient closing force for doors left ajar. The adjustable tension allows you to regulate the closing force, providing you a nice using experience. Specifications: Material: iron with an electroplated coating Color: silver Size: about 3-1/2 inches in length and width, with corner radius about 5/8", and thickness about 0.11 inches/ 2.7 mm Package includes: 10 x Door hinges 5 x Hex wrenches 5 x internal angle screwdrivers 20 x Positioning rods 60 x Flat head screws 60 x Pointed screws Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

name: 3 Pack Self Closing Door Hinges, 4 Inch Spring Loaded Door Hinges, Adjustable Tension for Garage, Front Door, Back Door, for Left and Right Hand Door, 5/8'' Radius Corners, UL Listed
short_description: 【Standard Application】This 4'' standard door hinge is highly suitable for any commercial or frequently used doors, such as garages, wardrobes, kitchens, offices, etc.
【Ease of Installation】Following the steps in the instruction manual, even beginners can easily complete the installation.

【Automatic Closing Feature】The self-closing door hinge ensures that the door closes gently and automatically after being opened, without the need for manual pushing or pulling, providing a quieter and more convenient experience for living or working environments.
【Loading Capacity】A pair of spring hinges can support doors weighing 85 to 100 pounds. A single hinge can bear a weight not exceeding 40 pounds. Suitable for both left-hand and right-hand doors.
【Quality Certification】The spring hinges comply with the UL-certified ANSI Grade 1 standard. The sturdy metal surface is treated to prevent rusting.

name: 4 Inch Self Closing Door Hinges, 5/8" Radius Corners Spring Loaded Hings for Exterior, Garage, Front and Back Door, UL Listed, for Left and Right Hand Door, Brushed Nickel, 2 Pack
short_description: 【Standard Fit】 These 4 inch auto close door hinges, with a 5/8" radius and a 0.1" thickness, are commonly used on garage doors, front doors, back doors, etc.
【Self Closing】 The self closing hinges are spring-loaded, providing strong closing force for doors that are often left open. Adjustable tension allows you to freely set the door to be closed or ajar.
【Loading Weight】 A pair of spring loaded door hinges can support a door weighing 85 to 100 lbs. One can support up to 40 lbs. Applicable to both left and right-handed doors.
【Certified Quality】 UL listed and ANSI Grade 1 certified for safety and durability. Constructed from solid metal with a rust-resistant finish.
【Easy to Install & Adjust】 Simply replace your old hinges using a screwdriver. No need to remove the door! Includes a hex wrench for easy tension adjustment.

It is suitable for indoor doors such as offices, kitchens, bathrooms, bedrooms, living rooms, classrooms, and double folding door hardware.

【Safety Certification】Matte black spring loaded hinges have UL certification. We care about your quality of life.
